post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, December 17
post.Content:
We're definitely heading into the holiday season now - the link count is decreasing as people prepare to take some much-deserved holidays!

  • Gerrit Grunwald has two posts this week, both of which are really interesting. Firstly, he has created an implementation of 'William Playfair' charts, and secondly, he has implemented support for gradients along a path.
  • Adam Carroll has released VocabHunter 1.0.22. VocabHunter is an Open Source tool designed to help you to learn a foreign language.
  • Jyloo Software have released Synthetica V3, as well as SyntheticaAddons V3.
